subject: long shipping time
description_text:
﻿
﻿Hi i last week i ordered a pair of plus x pedals and the shipping hasnt updated and for the last 6 or so days its been stuck on “shipping label created” im wondering if you guys haven’t sent it out or if something is causing a delay.
tracking number:
order number: #SSN1918

thank you for your time

conversations.body_text: Hi Kaleb Aguilar,  We pushed our US warehouse staff again, they feedback that it has been shipped on Monday, but there is a delay in updating due to the recent busy logistics, it should be delivered for you in the next two days, please don't worry.
